awards.text: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 21 wins & 19 nominations.

fullplot: A semiautobiographical project by John Boorman about a nine year old boy called Bill as he grows up in London during the blitz of World War 2. For a young boy, this time in history was more of an adventure, a total upheaval of order, restrictions and discipline. The liberating effect of the war on the women left behind. And the joy when Hitler blows up your school.

title: Hope and Glory
